mapper.insert:
insert into db_bullet.orders(order_no, user_id, resource_type, domain_id, amount, name, price_amount, discount_amount, pay_amount, pay_type, status, trade_no, pay_time, refund_time, cancel_time, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.orderNo}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.resourceType}, #{entity.domainId}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.priceAmount}, #{entity.discountAmount}, #{entity.payAmount}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.tradeNo}, #{entity.payTime}, #{entity.refundTime}, #{entity.cancelTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into db_bullet.orders(order_no, user_id, resource_type, domain_id, amount, name, price_amount, discount_amount, pay_amount, pay_type, status, trade_no, pay_time, refund_time, cancel_time, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.orderNo}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.resourceType}, #{entity.domainId}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.priceAmount}, #{entity.discountAmount}, #{entity.payAmount}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.tradeNo}, #{entity.payTime}, #{entity.refundTime}, #{entity.cancelTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update order_no = values(order_no) , user_id = values(user_id) , resource_type = values(resource_type) , domain_id = values(domain_id) , amount = values(amount) , name = values(name) , price_amount = values(price_amount) , discount_amount = values(discount_amount) , pay_amount = values(pay_amount) , pay_type = values(pay_type) , status = values(status) , trade_no = values(trade_no) , pay_time = values(pay_time) , refund_time = values(refund_time) , cancel_time = values(cancel_time) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
